All Implemented Interfaces:

public class SettingsDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

GUI that allos the settings to be changed.

private void consistencyCheck()
This method checks that the values all make sense and adjusts them if not.

writeValues

private void writeValues()
after the save button is clicked this method is invoked which reads the values off the GUI fields and writes them to the Settings object.

checkLogfile

public boolean checkLogfile(java.lang.String validationFile)
this method verifies that the file specified in the logfileJTextField is valid. It sets the color of the font to red if this is not ok and returns false to the caller. If all is fine it returns true;

checkAutoLoad

public boolean checkAutoLoad(java.lang.String validationFile)
this method verifies that the file specified in the logfileJTextField is valid. It sets the color of the font to red if this is not ok and returns false to the caller. If all is fine it returns true;
